name: Psychological Warfare Resilience
description: Training in resisting cognitive warfare tactics used in PsyOps and controlled media.

cards.title: Recognizing Cognitive Warfare Techniques
cards.description: Understanding how mass psychological influence is used to shape beliefs and behaviors.
bulletpoints: Breaking down psychological operations (PsyOps) in mainstream discourse.
Identifying how authority figures use suggestibility to enforce narratives.
Recognizing the psychological markers of controlled opposition and false resistance.
cards.summaryText: Breaks down mainstream psyops, authority-driven suggestibility, and tells that signal staged opposition.

cards.title: Emotional Regulation Against Psychological Attacks
cards.description: Techniques to maintain mental clarity under intense psychological manipulation.
bulletpoints: Applying detachment techniques to resist cognitive infiltration.
Using mindfulness and meta-awareness to observe psychological triggers.
Developing psychological countermeasures against mass panic scenarios.
cards.summaryText: Centers on emotional detachment, mindful observation, and contingency drills to keep cognition uncontaminated.

cards.title: Defeating Psychological Warfare Strategies
cards.description: Proven methods for countering PsyOps and reclaiming narrative control.
bulletpoints: Disrupting coordinated disinformation campaigns with real-time fact-checking.
Exposing inconsistencies in mass media reporting to collapse credibility.
Using strategic communication to reverse-engineer psychological manipulation.
cards.summaryText: Details rapid fact-checking, narrative exposure, and counter-messaging to dismantle psychological warfare plays.
